Below are links to relevant resources. Download individual reports in
the table below.

```{r table_req}
# Packages
library(readxl)
library(knitr)
library(kableExtra)
#library(DT)

# Data
fn <- "References.xlsx"
path <- file.path("files", fn)
df <- read_excel(path, sheet = "References")

df %>%
  kable(escape = FALSE, format = "html") %>%
  kable_styling(full_width = F, position = "left")
```
